snippet: Jackie Traina and Amanda Locke each had three-run doubles and Alabama forced a decisive third game in the Women’s College World Series finals by beating Oklahoma, 8-6, in Oklahoma City.
abstract: Alabama defeats Oklahoma, 8-6, to force a decisive third game in the Women's College World Series.
lead_paragraph: Jackie Traina and Amanda Locke each had three-run doubles and Alabama forced a decisive third game in the Women’s College World Series finals by beating Oklahoma, 8-6, in Oklahoma City.

headline.seo: Alabama Wins to Tie Women’s College World Series
headline.main: Alabama Wins to Tie Women’s College World Series
